statements: DELETE FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 100 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM PatientData WHERE ethnicity = 'Hispanic' AND drug_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM DrugEfficacy WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND efficacy_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM PatientDemographics WHERE patient_id = 100 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM DrugEfficacy WHERE drug_name = 'Drug A' AND efficacy_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND ethnicity = 'Asian';
